content: designer katri salmi pattern villa mairea foundation the mairea socks are inspired by the many unique details of villa mairea aino and alvar aalto 1939 yarn usage filcolana arwetta mustard yellow 30 38 g white 28 35 g black 26 32 g gauge in stranded colorwork 32 sts x 38 rnds = 10 cm 4 the mairea socks are worked using three colors of fingering weight 4-ply sock yarn with a yardage of approximately 400 m / 100 g the sample pair is knitted with filcolana arwetta in shades 101 natural white 102 black and 136 mustard however you can substitute it with any yarn of the same weight for example drops fabel novita viola or opal uni 4ply the colors used in the pattern reflect the color palette of villa mairea but feel free to choose your own combination using yarns of the same weight you will also need 2 5 mm double-pointed needles or 2 5 mm circular needles if you prefer the magic loop method choose your needle size according to your personal gauge a tapestry needle for weaving in ends and working the decorative embroidery this pattern is suitable for intermediate knitters but we ve included suggestions to make it more accessible if you d like to simplify certain parts
